CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 9, 1953, pg. 31 reads: "At IKS May Festival - When Irene Kaufmann opened its playground on May 1 with its annual pageant and parade for children, called the "May Festival." Mrs. Anne Rose, afternoon program supervisor, crowned these four children as winners of some of the may events.  Left to right: Mrs. Rose, Delilah Moten, George Ransan, Casandra Williams and John Brown. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Anne Rose, crowning winners of May Festival pageant, from left: Delilah Moten, Casandra Williams, George Ransan, and John Brown, at Irene Kaufmann Settlement
